Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound #72 North Reroute near North Ave/Kennedy Expressway
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted near North Ave/Kennedy Expressway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Ashland, Division, Elston, North Ave, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near North Ave/Kennedy Expressway.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
